tools.title: Anime.js
tools.desc: Anime is a flexible yet lightweight JavaScript animation library. It works with CSS, Individual Transforms, SVG, DOM attributes and JS Objects.

tools.title: GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform)
tools.desc: GSAP is a suite of tools for scripted, high-performance HTML5 animations that work in all major browsers.

tools.title: Vivus
tools.desc: Vivus is a lightweight JavaScript class (with no dependencies) that allows you to animate SVGs, giving them the appearence of being drawn.

tools.title: Google Web Designer
tools.desc: Build interactive, animated HTML5 creative, no coding necessary.

tools.title: TweenJS
tools.desc: JavaScript library for tweening and animating HTML5 and JavaScript properties. Works stand-alone or integrated with EaselJS.

tools.title: Animatron
tools.desc: Animatron is an online tool that allows you to create stunning HTML5 animations and interactive content.

tools.title: Snap.svg
tools.desc: Snap.svg is designed for modern browsers and therefore supports the newest SVG features like masking, clipping, patterns, full gradients, groups, and more.

tools.title: MotionComposer
tools.desc: MotionComposer bridges the gap between enthusiasts and professional designers with animations tools.
